Title: With Six You Get Eggroll
Writer: Gwen Bagni (screenplay), Paul Dubov (screenplay), Harvey Bullock (screenplay), R.S. Allen (screenplay), Gwen Bagni (story), Paul Dubov (story)
Actors: Doris Day, Brian Keith, Pat Carroll, Barbara Hershey
Plot: Abby McClure, a widow with three sons, and Jake Iverson, a widower with a teen-age daughter, get fixed up. They start dating and decide to get married. They're not prepared for the hostile reactions from their children, especially Jake's daughter Stacy, who wants to be the woman of the house, and Abby's oldest son Flip, who hates Jake.
